gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Interface MCTViewManifestationInfo

All Superinterfaces:
NamingContext, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
MCTViewManifestationInfoImpl
public interface MCTViewManifestationInfo
extends java.io.Serializable, NamingContext

Defines the UI rendering info used in persistence of composed views. This class should not generally be used and is scheduled for removal.
